document.full_text: yemeni air force planes tuesday bombed rural areas where tribesmen demanding the resignation of president ali abdullah saleh live, the tribesmen said, a sign that violence gripping the fractious state may be escalating.
document.title: yemen jets bomb anti-saleh tribal area: tribesmen
lines_and_colors: yemeni air force planes tuesday bombed rural areas where tribesmen demanding the resignation of president ali abdullah saleh live, the tribesmen said, a sign that violence gripping the fractious state may be escalating.
